sentence: In early trading on Wednesday, shares of Boeing ( BA ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 3.5%.
Year to date, Boeing registers a 22.9% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is United Technologies Corp ( UTX ), trading down 1.9%.
United Technologies Corp is lower by about 0.1% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Walt Disney ( DIS ), trading down 1.8%, and Home Depot ( HD ), trading up 1.8% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
